pageContent:
Not the exactly same 
Hello everyone, 
Kunj Purvish Shah goes by Kunj although people may use any name when addressing him. I come 
from India while studying Computer Science at university where my pronouns consist of 
he/him/his. 
I am completely infatuated with my exploration of machine learning which started not too long ago. 
I spend much time constructing models while studying the vast industrial effects that machine 
learning creates. These systems use ML technology including ChatGPT and Netflix 
recommendation engines along with face recognition for device security and assistants powered by 
Alexa while self-driving vehicles from Waymo make up another example. Modern technology 
interacts with humans differently because this field continues to transform the user experience. 
Among all the possible objects in Beauty & the Beasted I would prefer to be a smart speaker such 
as Alexa or Google Assistant. Why? The smart speaker shows its beauty in its universal usefulness

Among all the possible objects in Beauty & the Beasted I would prefer to be a smart speaker such 
as Alexa or Google Assistant. Why? The smart speaker shows its beauty in its universal usefulness 
and simultaneously fights like a beast through its ability to retrieve vast internet information. Smart 
speakers combine the characteristics of being an approachable friend and an information 
database that is powerful at the same time. 
I would choose burrito bowls as my one-food choice for eternal eating because they combine 
health with versatility and offer the perfect addition of guacamole. Why? A burrito bowl offers a 
great nutritional value combined with effortless adaptability without demanding any spiciness to 
achieve its deliciousness. The burrito bowl stands out with guacamole on top because it offers 
superior tastiness to all food combinations. 
Currently I feel strongly positive about the educational path I follow since it involves researching AI

superior tastiness to all food combinations. 
Currently I feel strongly positive about the educational path I follow since it involves researching AI 
technology and operating smart speakers and eating burrito bowls. My appreciation goes to all 
listeners for their attention together with my excitement for what comes next.
